name: SlopyJump!
description:
A Gameboy-inspired platformer made for the Retrograde Jam 3.



The objective is to jump to the top to reunite Sloppy with his lost friends!

Can you do it? Beware of surprises that may lie ahead!

Controls:

MovementArrow KeysA ( Used for selecting on the menu ) AB ( Used for Jumping )BSelect ( Used to quickly return to the menu )Esc

Thanks to Efefsok for the fantastic pixel art and to Valdezv666 for the amazing Gameboy music :D
